text: Hi guys, I'd like to change the global settings of the font-size of the GDPR notice/consent. Where can I change this?

Hi all

I've been looking at the POWER HubSpot theme and we are possibly interested in purchasing it.

We have a current website with HubSpot (no theme currently installed). When you download a theme does it just add the pages and modules or will it affect the overall current website?

Or will we have to develop a new website on a staging site? We have a lot of content on our website so creating a new website on a staging site isn't an option for us. We want to do it gradually page-by-page over time.

Thanks for your help

Alex
Hi <@U01HZ2SQ1TR>, thank you for your interest in our product. I have just sent you an email. We can continue the communication there :slightly_smiling_face:
Actually - I'd like to specifically change the font-size of the privacy text field.. Anyone?
